       The Ice Cave doors slid open. Rampage exited the cave, followed by 
Black Aracnia, and Waspinator. Inferno would stay behinde with Hell Beast to 
defend the base.
       "Shockwave, its an honor to work with you. A Predacon fellowship as 
this one, in such bitter times, is very greatful." Black Aracnia stated, as 
diplomatically as she could in the fridgid artic weather.
       Rampage walked forward, "Were wasting time. Lets be off!" And looked 
to Shockwave.

--part1_75.e805e76.2787b72e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
